content: प्रतिनिर्देश्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} That which, though before expressed, is repeated in order to state something more about it; <ab>cf.</ab> the instance given in <ls>K. P. 7</ls>; उदेति सविता ताम्रस्ताम्र एवास्तमेति च, where ताम्र is repeated to show that the sun that rises {%red%} sets also {%red%}.
